pages.title: Fuel Injection Port
pages.text: The Fuel Injection Port allow you to insert or extract fluid reactants that will fill your $(l:bigreactors:reactor/part-fuelrod)Fuel Rods$(/l) and power your Reactor.$(br2)In the graphical interface you can set the Port mode: in $(bold)inlet mode$() the Port will accept fluid fuel, in $(bold)outlet mode$() it will output fluid wastes.
A $(l:bigreactors:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to change the Port mode.$(br2)Unlike with the Solid Access Port, there is no loss of material using the Fuel Injection Port.

$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() Reinforced$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes$(br)$(l)Wrench:$() a $(l:bigreactors:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to toggle the Port mode
